extension.name: IceAccordion Module
extension.author: IceTheme
extension.description:
IceAccordion Module

IceAccordion Module can display a set of articles in a small area on your website in an accordion way. This Module is released under the GPL license.

  • IceAccordion Page
  • Discussion

fields.name: params

field.name: created_by
field.label: MOD_ACCORDION_FIELD_AUTHOR_LABEL
field.query: select id, name, username from #__users where id IN (select distinct(created_by) from #__content) order by name ASC

field.name: created_by_alias
field.label: MOD_ACCORDION_FIELD_AUTHORALIAS_LABEL
field.query: select distinct(created_by_alias) from #__content where created_by_alias != '' order by created_by_alias ASC
